name: Senity
description:
THIS GAME DEVELOPS WITH YOU.
Slip into the role of a Cyber Mercenary either alone or as a team to stop Senity, a gone rogue military A.I. (Artificial Intelligence) that already claimed many lives on its way. Survive long enough with your friends and find a way to stop her.

Certainly no unknown scenario, if there wasn’t a catch - this A.I. is real.SINGLE PLAYER / CO-OP
Play the campaign alone or with up to 6 players. You decide how it ends.
  • Campaign (default): Play the campaign as we intended it. Infiltrate the military development facility M.A.R.U. , uncover dark backgrounds in the development of Senity and find a way to stop the killing.
  • Campaign (Senity K.I.): Play new campaigns generated by real artificial intelligence based on your behavior and her will on-the-fly. Meet familiar and yet different characters with ever-new interaction, storyline and endings. Each campaign can be shared at any time using a dynamically generated seed and saved with its current progress - even if it's not yet completed.
HUNTING
In a massive online battle with up to 500 players, head for Senity and kill her in one way or another.
  • Find and kill Senity first or activate different, A.I. generated, placed and hidden Map Objectives.. Your way to the goal is never the same.
  • Move on a battlefield up to 20 kilometers without any restrictions.
  • Forge unholy alliances with up to two other teams on the battlefield, get buffs, and increase your win probability. But beware - only one can win in the end.
  • Loot items and weapons, repair damaged bodyparts and acquire super abilities based on your equipment - right in the middle of the battlefield.
MULTIPLAYER
No lootboxes, no Pay-2-Win or other unnecessary bells and whistles - just you and your skills. Challenge your enemies alone or with up to 5 Players in known game modes like Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture-the-Flag or Conquest.
